msbt.message: The saplings at Leif's store are uber rare. You can't even buy them at Nook's Cranny, . It's not like that's a huge surprise. Plants are kind of Leif's thing.Kinda like how my "thing" is singing, dancing, and sending super-positive vibes out into the universe.

Apparently, I have a reputation for being high energy and always"on."But I'd much rather be known for my laid-back, chill-girl attitude. What I need is an image makeover! I hear folks who garden are way more relaxed. I wonder if that's trueLeif is into plants and stuff, and he's super chill, so there must be something to it.I have a plan. Buy as many different saplings and seeds at Leif's store as I can ASAP. Then, devote my entire life to becoming the most relaxed person, like, EVER!

Did you know that if you plant flowers side by side, sometimes new ones will grow nearby? And that new flower could end up being a super-rare color! Leif told me about it. They're called "hybrids." Imagine how stunning your garden could be, bursting with all those new and brilliant colors. But that kind of beauty takes diligence. Water your flowers daily for the best results, .

Turning flowers into accessories is a great way to add a cute pop of color to any red-carpet look. Though I do feel kinda bad every time I pluck a flower.Then againmaybe they're grateful that I'm giving them a greater purpose. Fashion!

Hey, . Have you heard about Nature Day? It's a whole day dedicated to celebrating nature! The whole planet deserves our love, from the tiniest blade of grass to the tallest tree in the forest! If I'm going to be upstaged by anyone, it may as well be Mother Nature, .
